mapper.insert: insert into WORKHUB_IWORK.ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO(MSG_ID, SENDER, RECEIVER, CREATETIME, LEVELS, TYPE, ISCROSS, IP, FILE_TYPE, MSG, FILE_ID, FRONT_ID, CONTENT ) values (#{msgId}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, sysdate, #{levels}, #{type}, #{iscross}, #{ip}, #{fileType}, #{msg}, #{fileId}, #{frontId}, #{content} )
mapper.update:
update WORKHUB_IWORK.ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO
SENDER = #{sender},
RECEIVER = #{receiver},
CREATETIME = #{createtime},
LEVELS = #{levels},
CONTENT = #{content},
TYPE = #{type},
CANCEL = #{cancel}, CANCEL_TIME = sysdate,
where MSG_ID = #{msgId}
mapper.select: select MSG_ID, SENDER, RECEIVER, CREATETIME, LEVELS, TYPE, ISCROSS, IP, FILE_TYPE, MSG, FILE_ID, FRONT_ID from WORKHUB_IWORK.ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO where MSG_ID = #{msgId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY contactsId ORDER BY createtime DESC) RN ,t.* FROM ( select T.TYPE,t.content,t.createtime, (case when t.sender =#{userId} then t.receiver else t.sender end) as contactsId from zz_message_info t where (t.sender = #{userId} or t.receiver = #{userId}) and t.type = 'USER' and t.cancel = '0' UNION ALL
select T.TYPE,t.content,t.createtime,t.receiver as contactsId from ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO t LEFT JOIN ZZ_USER_GROUP UG ON UG.GROUP_ID=T.RECEIVER where t.type = 'GROUP' and t.cancel = '0' and nvl(t.createtime,to_date('1900-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd')) >= nvl(ug.createtime,to_date('2099-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd')) AND UG.USER_ID =#{userId} ) t ) ) VO where rn < =100 ORDER BY VO.createtime ASC

select t.type,t.content,t.createtime, t.receiver as contactsId from ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO t
,ZZ_GROUP g
,ZZ_MEETING g
where t.type = #{type} and t.cancel = '0'
and ((t.receiver = #{receiver} and t.sender = #{userId}) or (t.sender = #{receiver} and t.receiver = #{userId}) )
and t.receiver = g.group_id and t.receiver = #{receiver} and exists ( select 1 from ZZ_USER_GROUP u where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.group_id = #{receiver} and u.createtime <= t.createtime)
and t.receiver = g.id and t.receiver = #{receiver} and exists ( select 1 from ZZ_MEETING_USER u where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.meeting_id = #{receiver} and u.crt_time <= t.createtime)
ORDER BY t.createtime ASC

select t.msg_id, T.TYPE, sender.id senderid, sender.name sendername, sender.avartar senderavatar, sender.levels senderlevels, sender.pid senderpid, receiver.id receiverid, receiver.name receivername, receiver.avartar receiveravatar, receiver.member_num receivermembernum, receiver.levels receiverlevels, receiver.group_owner receivergroupowner, receiver.pid receiverpid, f.file_id fileid, f.file_ext fileext, to_char(f.sizes) filesize, t.levels levels, t.front_id frontid, t.file_type filetype, t.msg msg, to_char(t.createtime,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') createtime, t.receiver as contactsId from ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO t, zz_contact_inf sender, zz_contact_inf receiver, zz_group_file f
,ZZ_GROUP g
,ZZ_MEETING g
where t.type = #{type} and t.cancel = '0' and t.sender = sender.id and t.receiver = receiver.id and t.file_id = f.file_id(+)
and ((t.receiver = #{receiver} and t.sender = #{userId}) or (t.sender = #{receiver} and t.receiver = #{userId}) )
and t.receiver = g.group_id and t.receiver = #{receiver} and exists ( select 1 from ZZ_USER_GROUP u where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.group_id = #{receiver} and u.createtime <= t.createtime)
and t.receiver = g.id and t.receiver = #{receiver} and exists ( select 1 from ZZ_MEETING_USER u where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.meeting_id = #{receiver} and u.crt_time <= t.createtime)
ORDER BY t.createtime ASC
